translation.es: Parece que se cansó de mi caviar.

translation.en: -That was funny. -Shh.
[Malcolm] Darling.
[Charles] You could've signed this at home.
translation.es: Lo hubieras firmado en tu casa.

translation.en: Instead, you called us here to humiliate us?
[Malcolm] Yes, and you came running.
Father, don't do this.
Or what?
[Malcolm] Yes.
That's what I thought.
[Vik] Don't shoot me! Don't shoot me, please!
-Daddy! -[screams]
You shot him!
No! I saw someone stab him.
-Who? -I don't know.
What happened? I heard a scr--
Malcolm!
Oh, God!
Has anybody tried to revive him?
He's got a knife plunged in his heart. I don't think he's revivable.
translation.es: Lo apuñalaron en el corazón. Es imposible revivirlo.

translation.en: Should we pull it out?
No. It's a foot-long knife. It's just like pulling--
translation.es: No, es enorme. Es como sacar...

translation.en: Oh, God!
Wow! You should have left the knife in for the po-po, Colonel, man!
-I'll put it back. -Don't put it back.
Oh! Will you listen to my husband? He's a detective.
translation.es: Háganle caso a mi marido. Es detective.

translation.en: Yes, yes. What should we do, Mr. Officer?
Well, for starters, let's stop removing and reinserting the murder weapon into the victim's chest.
translation.es: En principio, dejen de sacar y poner el arma asesina en el pecho de la víctima.

translation.en: In fact, let's stop touching the body altogether.
translation.es: Y mejor sería que dejaran de tocar el cuerpo.

translation.en: He was gonna take it all away.
translation.es: Nos lo iba a quitar todo.

translation.en: For you.
[Vik] Yo...
Did he sign it?
Yes!
We should make sure he doesn't have another copy on him.
translation.es: Fijémonos si no tiene otra copia encima.

translation.en: Rifling through the pockets of the corpse counts as touching, yup.
translation.es: Hurgar en los bolsillos del cadáver es tocarlo.

translation.en: Sorry to single you out like that, Ms. Ballard. You're wonderful.
translation.es: Lamento ponerte en evidencia. Eres maravillosa, luces espléndida.

translation.en: -You look extravagant tonight. -[Audrey] Okay. What's next?
translation.es: Eres maravillosa, luces espléndida. Bien, ¿qué sigue?

translation.en: We have to preserve the crime scene.
Captain Wong, is there any way you can lock off this place?
translation.es: Capitán Wong, ¿es posible cerrar el salón?

translation.en: Yes, of course.
So we should then start questioning the suspects.
Suspects?
We're not questioning anybody.
Wong, when you finish locking up here, you bring me the key.
translation.es: Wong, cuando cierre aquí, deme la llave.

translation.en: Then you radio Interpol, tell 'em we'll meet 'em at the docks in Monaco.
translation.es: Y avise por radio a Interpol que nos esperen en Mónaco.

translation.en: In the meantime, I'm gonna check the shrimp out a little closer.
For the investigation? No, Wong, because I'm hungry as shit.
translation.es: - ¿Para la investigación? - No, Wong, tengo hambre.

translation.en: The rest of you, I'd lock yourselves in your chambers or your yacht rooms
translation.es: Los demás será mejor que se encierren en sus camarotes,

translation.en: because one of us...
is a murderer.
-Audrey. -Yeah?
Get the cocktail sauce.
Yep.
Wait a second. What on earth is on these?
I don't know. This Maurice guy must breastfeed each shrimp individually.
translation.es: No sé. Maurice debe haber alimentado a los langostinos uno por uno.

translation.en: I mean, they live so well.
-Oh, God, yeah. -God.
All right. Where were we? Okay, okay, okay.
You know what? There had to be two people in on the killing.
translation.es: Deben de haberlo matado entre dos, ¿sabes?

translation.en: Because how could they know when the lights were gonna go out?
translation.es: Si no, ¿cómo iban a saber cuándo se apagarían las luces?

translation.en: -That's smart, that's smart. -Right?
I'm tired as hell right now. I'm gonna go to sleep.
translation.es: Estoy agotado. Me voy a dormir.

translation.en: -Are you kidding me? -What?
You're not jet-lagged?
-Nick. -[groans]
-Honey, come on, seriously. -Huh?
Who do you think did it?
I don't think. I know.
Who?
It was the son.
-Tobey. -No.
No way. Not a chance. It's too obvious.
translation.es: No puede ser. Para nada, es muy obvio.

translation.en: The most obvious suspect is never, never the killer.
translation.es: El sospechoso más obvio nunca es el asesino.

translation.en: The most obvious suspect is always the killer.
translation.es: El sospechoso más obvio es siempre el asesino.

translation.en: When a wife gets killed, 90% of the time it was the husband.
translation.es: Cuando matan a una esposa, el 90 % de las veces es el marido.

translation.en: Why did you just use that as an example?
And I disagree. I think people are more complicated than that.
translation.es: No estoy de acuerdo. La gente es mucho más complicada.

translation.en: Judging off of what? Those books that you read?
translation.es: ¿Te basas en esos libros que lees?

translation.en: People are simple, okay? It was Tobey.
translation.es: La gente es simple, ¿sí? Fue Tobey.

translation.en: He had the most to gain, and he also had the most to lose.
translation.es: Es el que más se beneficia, pero también el más perjudicado.

translation.en: Which is exactly why he's not the killer.
translation.es: Por eso no es el asesino.

translation.en: Did you ever fool around on a boat?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez lo hiciste en un barco?

translation.en: Do you know how much fun that could be?
I just lay here and the boat does all the work.
translation.es: Me acuesto y el barco hace todo.

translation.en: -That's so convenient for you. -You know I have a bad back.
translation.es: - Siempre cómodo. - Es por mi espalda.

translation.en: So convenient for you.
What about the lights?
Yeah, leave 'em on. I don't care. Either way. Lady's choice.
translation.es: Déjalas, no me importa. Da lo mismo. Tú eliges.

translation.en: Shh! No. Who turned out those lights?
What?! Oh!
Don't look at me like that. I can feel it.
translation.es: No me mires así. Puedo sentirlo.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. Excuse me. -Will you take the Allegra? It's the same stuff.
translation.es: - Disculpa. - Toma el Allegra, es lo mismo.

translation.en: -I don't want to talk about it. -Oh, God.
translation.es: - No quiero hablar de eso. - Dios.

translation.en: [Audrey] Enter the brilliant yet tortured detective,
translation.es: Ingresa el brillante y atormentado detective.

translation.en: right on cue.
My name is Inspector Laurent Delacroix.
I will now summon you one by one to the grand lounge for questioning.
translation.es: Los llamaré uno por uno al gran salón para interrogarlos.

translation.en: Why is that smoke ring so good? How did he do that?
translation.es: ¿Cómo le salió tan bien ese anillo de humo?

translation.en: Oh, you broke it. You broke it.
Tell me about Malcolm Quince.
He was the most wonderful--
Swine.
He was the love of my life.
translation.es: Era el amor de mi vida.

translation.en: He was a complicated man.
Describe to me what happened.
Yo, Mr. French Policeman, man. It was mad. Lights went out.
translation.es: Mire, señor policía francés, fue algo de locos. Se apagaron las luces.

translation.en: [Colonel] I thought I saw something move, and I shot.
translation.es: Vi que algo se movía y disparé.

translation.en: Yes. Finish line.
The old man got what was coming to him.
One-eight-seven, motherfu--
Did anyone touch the body?
And did you notice anything else out of the ordinary?
-[all] The Americans. -Yes, number one. Yes.
translation.es: - Los estadounidenses... - Sí, número uno. Sí.

translation.en: [Audrey] Aren't you gonna, um... Aren't you gonna separate us?
-For the interrogation. -[Nick] Okay.
Question us separately, see if our...
-What are you doing? -...answers match.
What? I'm just saying, our answers will match
translation.es: - Solo digo. - Bien. Nuestras respuestas coincidirán porque somos inocentes.

translation.en: -because we're innocent. -Yeah, that's right.
translation.es: Nuestras respuestas coincidirán porque somos inocentes. Así es.

translation.en: There we go. God, you are really good at that. [chuckles]
We found this in Tobey Quince's suite.
translation.es: Encontramos esto en la suite de Tobey Quince.

translation.en: A typewritten suicide note
translation.es: Una nota de suicidio escrita a máquina

translation.en: in which he confesses to the murder of his father.
translation.es: en la que confiesa haber asesinado a su padre.

translation.en: Typewritten? -Mm-mm. -That's not very common.
translation.es: ¿A máquina? Eso no es muy común.

translation.en: -Very suspicious. -[Nick] Yes.
Yeah, obviously someone is trying to frame Tobey for his father's murder.
translation.es: Obviamente, alguien quiere inculpar a Tobey por el asesinato de su padre.

translation.en: -[Audrey] This is amazing. -[Nick] Look how excited she is.
So where's your head at with this whole thing?
I mean, who are your chief suspects?
You.
-Woo, yes. -Right, of course, -'cause everybody is a suspect. -Especially her. [laughs]
translation.es: - Claro. Todos somos sospechosos. - Especialmente ella.

translation.en: This is a group of friends and family who have known each other for years.
translation.es: Este es un grupo de amigos y parientes que se conocen desde hace años.

translation.en: You two show up, and ten hours later, two of them are dead.
translation.es: Llegan ustedes y, diez horas después, dos han muerto.

translation.en: Coincidence?
-Yes. -Absolutely.
-Coincidence. -Wait. Excuse me.
Are you saying that your theory
is that the two of us conned our way onto a stranger's boat at the last minute
translation.es: ...logramos subir mediante engaños al barco de un extraño para cometer...

translation.en: to commit premeditated murder that benefits us in no way?
translation.es: ...logramos subir mediante engaños al barco de un extraño para cometer... ...un homicidio que no nos beneficia en nada?

translation.en: That's your theory?
Perhaps someone paid you to do it.
-No. -Paid us to do it? [laughs]
Oh, my gosh. I would love to see that. Show me that money.
translation.es: Dios mío, quisiera ver dónde está ese dinero.

translation.en: [Audrey] Do you want to see our bank statements? [stammers] We're broke.
translation.es: ¿Quiere ver nuestros extractos bancarios? Estamos en bancarrota.

translation.en: Desperate for money. I see.
Now you gave him a motive.
translation.es: - Acabas de darle un motivo. - No, ya lo sé.

translation.en: -No, no, no. I know. Just don't... -We did this because--
translation.es: - Acabas de darle un motivo. - No, ya lo sé. - Dijiste que no tenemos nada. - Está fuera de contexto.

translation.en: -...take my words out of context. -We got nothing.
translation.es: - Dijiste que no tenemos nada. - Está fuera de contexto.

translation.en: -That's all we got, is nothing. -No.
Listen, I am talking to you, detective to detective.
translation.es: Mire, le hablaré de detective a detective.

translation.en: We didn't do this. -You can see in my eyes. You can tell. -Mm-mm.
translation.es: Nosotros no fuimos. Puede verlo en mis ojos.

translation.en: Perhaps I will have that word with you independently.
translation.es: Quizá sí deba hablar con usted por separado.

translation.en: I di-- Hey!
I can get up. Hey, okay.
[Nick] I'll be out in a minute.
[Nick] I love you.
I'm sorry. She's just excited because it's-- -She reads books, and this is fun for her. -[door closes]
translation.es: Disculpe, está muy emocionada. Lee libros y esto le resulta divertido.

translation.en: You wish me to believe you're innocent.
translation.es: Usted quiere que crea que son inocentes,

translation.en: Unfortunately, I do not believe liars.
translation.es: pero yo no les creo a los mentirosos.

translation.en: But I'm telling you the truth.
And how long have you been lying to your wife?
translation.es: ¿Desde cuándo le miente a su esposa?

translation.en: Excuse me?
You did not think that we would investigate your background,
translation.es: ¿Creyó que no íbamos a investigar sus antecedentes,

translation.en: Sergeant Nicholas Spitz, NYPD?
translation.es: sargento Nicholas Spitz, de la Policía de Nueva York?

translation.en: Failed his detective's exam three times.
translation.es: Desaprobó tres veces el examen para detective.

translation.en: You are, how you do say, cop on the beat, not detective as you so claim.
translation.es: Usted es lo que se llama un patrullero. No es detective como dice.

translation.en: So I... tell people I'm a detective.
translation.es: Sí, yo digo que soy detective.

translation.en: There's-- That's not a crime.
Impersonating a detective is a crime.
translation.es: Hacerse pasar por detective lo es.

translation.en: I didn't think it was a crime here. I thought maybe you guys had different rules.
translation.es: No pensé que aquí lo fuera. Creí que tenían otras normas.

translation.en: That doesn't make us murderers.
translation.es: Pero eso no nos hace asesinos.

translation.en: A broke, failed man, lying to his wife? I think it does.
translation.es: ¿Que sea un fracasado en la ruina que le miente a su esposa? Eso sí.

translation.en: You don't have any evidence. You can't hold us.
translation.es: No tiene pruebas. No puede detenernos.

translation.en: No, but I can hold these.
translation.es: No, pero puedo quedarme con esto.

translation.en: I believe Mr. Cavendish has provided accommodations for you
translation.es: Creo que el Sr. Cavendish les proporcionará alojamiento

translation.en: at the Hotel de Savoie, so you won't be on the street.
translation.es: en el Hotel de Savoie, así que no estarán en la calle.

translation.en: But mark my words, Officer Spitz,
I will not rest until I prove that you committed these murders.
translation.es: no descansaré hasta probar que ustedes cometieron esos asesinatos.

translation.en: And I... will rest, because I'm tired as shit, at that hotel you just said.
translation.es: Yo sí descansaré, porque estoy agotado, en el hotel que mencionó.

translation.en: It sounds like a good one.
But after I'm well-rested and I eat breakfast--
translation.es: Pero después de descansar y desayunar,

translation.en: hopefully the guy cooks as good as Maurice--
translation.es: Pero después de descansar y desayunar,  y ojalá que ahí cocinen como Maurice,

translation.en: I will not rest until I prove to you we have nothing to do with these murders.
translation.es: no descansaré hasta demostrarle que nosotros no tuvimos nada que ver.

translation.en: [man] Juan Carlos!
[woman] Juan Carlos!
[Audrey] Charles said that everyone's gonna be at this race, so whoever did this is gonna be there.
translation.es: Charles dijo que todos verían la carrera, así que el asesino estará aquí.

translation.en: We have to figure out who it is.
I know we've gotta figure it out. This isn't one of your books, sweetheart.
translation.es: "Debemos averiguar". No es uno de tus libros, cariño.

translation.en: I mean, it's like one of your books, but this is real.
translation.es: Se parece, pero esto es la realidad.

translation.en: Like, two people are dead, for real.
translation.es: Dos personas están muertas de verdad.

translation.en: -I know. -There's a real killer on the real loose.
translation.es: - Lo sé. - Hay un asesino real suelto.

translation.en: Hey, babe. Relax. What's-- What's wrong with you?
For real? Come on. Will you just focus... -Fine. -...on this with me?
Um, yes. Uh...
[Nick] Okay. So there are three basic motives for every murder.
translation.es: Hay tres motivos básicos para cometer un asesinato.

translation.en: [Audrey] Yes. The first one is money.
translation.es: - Sí. El primero es el dinero. - Exacto.

translation.en: Everyone was in Quince's will, except Suzi.
translation.es: - Todos heredaban a Quince menos Suzi. - Bien.

translation.en: -Okay. -All right. The second one is love.
We know nobody loved that guy 'cause he was kind of a prick.
translation.es: Sabemos que no lo querían. Era un cretino.

translation.en: Suzi might have loved him.
-That's what you would think-- -Okay, what's the third one?
-Revenge. -Right.
That's the one we should be thinking about.
I'm telling you, if we figure out who hates this guy the most, that's our killer.
translation.es: Si averiguamos quién lo odiaba más, tendremos al asesino.

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
So, this beard... It's incredible.
Do you oil that or condition?
You won't get anything out of him.
Oh, my gosh.
Most of his life, he's been serving men like me and Malcolm,
translation.es: Se pasó la vida sirviendo a hombres como Malcom y yo,

translation.en: despite being an heir to millions.
translation.es: a pesar de ser heredero de millones.

translation.en: He's rich, too?
He's supposed to be, but he's one of 16 children, and he's half French.
translation.es: Debería serlo, pero tiene 15 hermanos y es mitad francés.

translation.en: Are you familiar with French inheritance law?
Broad strokes.
That Colonel guy, he's getting on my nerves.
translation.es: - Ese coronel me pone nervioso. - Sí.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Shit. Walking around
translation.es: - Ese coronel me pone nervioso. - Sí. Va por ahí diciendo que tú mataste a los dos.

translation.en: -saying you killed both those guys. -Huh?
translation.es: Va por ahí diciendo que tú mataste a los dos.

translation.en: -Yeah. -What?
And I'm like, come on.
translation.es: Yo le dije que mi amigo no...

translation.en: -My man wouldn't do-- -Yo. Look, yo. I didn't do nothing, son.
translation.es: Yo le dije que mi amigo no... Oye, espera, yo no hice nada.

translation.en: -It doesn't matter what the will says. -Uh-huh.
translation.es: No importa qué diga el testamento.

translation.en: The fortune must be divided equally among the offspring.
translation.es: La fortuna se divide en partes iguales entre los hijos.

translation.en: Why do the French have such a law?
translation.es: ¿Por qué los franceses tienen esa ley?

translation.en: Well, they do it to keep all Frenchmen from doing what Malcolm was trying to do,
translation.es: Para evitar que los franceses hagan lo que Malcom quería hacer

translation.en: and leaving everything to their mistresses.
translation.es: y les dejen todo a sus amantes.

translation.en: -My theory is... -Yeah?
...Juan Carlos done it, man.
What? Why would he do that?
Well, Juan Carlos's dad used to race for Malcolm.
translation.es: El padre de Juan Carlos corría para Malcolm.

translation.en: Malcolm tried to get slick on some safety angle, and shit got overlooked.
translation.es: Malcolm se pasó de listo con una medida de seguridad - y nadie lo verificó, ¿sabes? - Bien.

translation.en: -Yeah? -Okay.
Juan Carlos's dad lost both his legs, G.
translation.es: El papá de Juan Carlos perdió ambas piernas.

translation.en: Yeah, straight up. [imitates bones snapping]
-Oh. -Gone.
So it's payback time. A hundred percent of a doubt.
translation.es: - Entonces, fue por venganza. - Cien por ciento seguro.

translation.en: Wh-What?
-Juan Carlos is your man. -Oh, yeah.
translation.es: - Juan Carlos es tu hombre. - Sí.

translation.en: You guarantee that?
Guarantee.
Respect.
Or maybe Sergei could have done it.
-Yeah. -Okay. So you're not guaranteeing it.
No, not a hundred percent. No.
-[sneezes] -Oh! Bless you.
Would you like some Allegra?
-I doubt that would be useful. -I know.
translation.es: - No creo que sirva. - Lo sé.

translation.en: It doesn't work. I tried to tell that to Nick.
translation.es: No funciona. Intenté decírselo a Nick.

translation.en: Do you need something?
Uh, no. Mm-mm.
The guy that throws me off the most-- Cavendish--
translation.es: El que más me desconcierta es Cavendish.

translation.en: to me, he seems like he's compensating for something,
translation.es: Me da la sensación de que intenta compensar algo,

translation.en: with the Great Gatsby look and the jawline and the "hey, I'm so gorgeous." Am I right?
translation.es: con su aire de gran Gatsby y su mandíbula, haciéndose el guapo todo el tiempo, ¿no?

translation.en: There's absolutely nothing wrong with Charles Cavendish.
translation.es: - Charles Cavendish no tiene nada malo. - ¿No...?

translation.en: -Isn't that the-- -Except...
he probably murdered his uncle.
Well, that's one thing wrong.
[commentator] ...comes to the checkered flag! It's Juan Carlos!
translation.es: ¡Llega a la bandera a cuadros! ¡Es Juan Carlos!

translation.en: Winner of this year's Monte Carlo Grand Prix!
[Audrey] I find that Suzi Nakamura very suspicious.
She's the only one who didn't have a motive.
translation.es: Es la única sin motivo para matar a Malcom.

translation.en: -It was Cavendish and you know it. -You just-- No, you just don't like him.
translation.es: - Sabes que fue Cavendish. - Lo dices porque no te cae bien.

translation.en: I don't like him. I don't. I hate his guts, but that's not it.
translation.es: No, no me cae bien, lo odio, pero no es eso.

translation.en: -Did you just steal all of those? -He's the sole blood heir.
translation.es: - ¿Robaste eso? - Es el único heredero de sangre.

translation.en: He stands to make the biggest claim for the fortune.
translation.es: Es quien más derecho tiene a la fortuna.

translation.en: I want one of these.
-Malcolm stole his fiancée. -Okay.
translation.es: - Malcom le robó la novia. - Bueno.

translation.en: That's all three motives. Money, love, revenge.
translation.es: Son los tres motivos: dinero, amor y venganza.

translation.en: We went past it. I don't know where we are. We're over here. Will you please try one of these?
translation.es: - Nos pasamos. ¿Dónde estamos? - Por aquí. Prueba esto.

translation.en: No! Oh, my God. You know what?
I think you just think it's Cavendish 'cause you're jealous of him.
translation.es: Piensas que es Cavendish porque estás celoso.

translation.en: -[scoffs] Oh, God. -Yeah.
-I'm jealous of him. -You are.
What? Why? What am I jealous of?
What is there to be jealous-- He's rich. He's charming.
He smells great.
What do you mean? What's he smell like?
He smells like he just came out of the dryer.
translation.es: Huele a recién salido de la secadora.

translation.en: What the-- What the--
[Audrey] No, no, no.
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
We should test that for fingerprints first.
Okay. Do you have the fingerprint testing kit?
-What? -'Cause I didn't pack mine. Is it in your bag?
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - No traje el mío. ¿Trajiste el tuyo?

translation.en: Stop it! Come on.
Hurry.
Oh, this is so crazy.
Oh, God. Seriously?
Oh, got it.
Will you please just go see a chiropractor?
translation.es: ¿Podrías ir a ver a un quiropráctico?

translation.en: It's gonna be fine.
"Come to suite 802."
-We have to go to 802. -We're not going to 802. Stop!
-Why? -It's a trap.
Why wouldn't whoever just knocked just come in and talk to us?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no golpeó y entró a hablar?

translation.en: Maybe he's being watched by the killer.
translation.es: Tal vez lo vigila el asesino.

translation.en: What if we're being watched by the killer?
What if he was in here?
Maybe he stole my Peanut M&Ms.
translation.es: Quizá fue quien robó mis M&M de cacahuate.

translation.en: I stole your Peanut M&Ms. You stole my Peanut M&Ms?
translation.es: - Yo te los robé. - ¿Tú me los robaste?

translation.en: -I wanted to see if they tasted the same! -You got to stop eating. You're gonna gain it all back.
translation.es: - Quería ver si aquí sabían igual. - Engordarás otra vez.

translation.en: I'm going to 802. Are you coming with me?
Okay, wait. Let me just...
-What? -...figure something out.
God damn.
-What are you doing? -It's a weapon.
That's a lamp. Not when I crack someone over the head with it.
translation.es: - Es una lámpara. - No si la uso para golpear a alguien.

translation.en: Will you stop questioning everything I do. Well, everything you do is questionable.
translation.es: - ¿Dejarás de cuestionarme? - Todo lo que haces es cuestionable.

translation.en: [whispering] That's 808.
Hello?
Note sender?
You told us to come to 802. Are you there?
translation.es: Nos dijiste que viniéramos aquí. ¿Estás ahí?

translation.en: Are you dead?
He might be in the bathroom.
Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!
[with deep voice] Sit on the bed.
You speak-- I thought you didn't speak.
Shut up. Sit on the bed.
-I'm sitting! -Shut up. Sit down.
We're gonna sit in front of the bed. All good.
translation.es: Nos sentamos en la cama. Tranquilo.

translation.en: I cannot keep his secrets anymore.
You mean the Colonel's, right?
translation.es: Hablas de los secretos del coronel, ¿no?

translation.en: The Colonel's secrets? I know, it's so hard to keep secrets.
translation.es: Hablas de los secretos del coronel, ¿no? Es muy difícil guardar secretos.

translation.en: It really is. You know, I have a friend named Gwen, and she has a box that she keeps under her bed--
translation.es: Es terrible. Mi amiga Gwen guarda una caja bajo su cama...
